_header: Well were him that wist / To whom he might trust
_description: A warning against false friends — one 6-line stanza (aabccb)

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
Wel were hym þat wystTo wam he myȝt trysteBote
                    þat ys in a wyreffor offte men but holde chere…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…as ryȝt as norþ and sowþto þylke hy but
                    sowe
CULAdd5943.Note:
Notation, parts parked for ‘clos tenor’ and ‘contra
                    tenor’.
